title: Quantum 3
description:
Quantum 3 is an educational match-3 game for all ages where fun meets quantum physics! 
 I was responsible for designing and implementing the puzzle grid system. This involved prototyping various input methods, dictating spawn rates to balance levels, and building a system that could dynamically scale the grid size. I also worked on the powerup system and the tutorial systems.

title: Mechalangelo
description:
Mechalangelo is an asyncronous 1-vs-1 multiplayer game. A VR (HTC Vive) player takes on the role of a giant painting machine, while the other uses a gamepad to control a glider. First to destroy the other wins! 
 I programmed and designed the ship character controller, implemented the 2D UI systems, and crafted spawning systems for the powerups and VR helper minions
